**SamPDFExtractor** is a powerful yet lightweight Python library for extracting text and structured data from both *digital* and *scanned PDFs*.  
Built to be **zero-dependency-friendly**, it works out of the box without complex installations â€” ideal for automation, document processing, or analytics workflows.

- ğŸª¶ **Lightweight** â€” minimal dependencies, easy to install and deploy
